1.0.1.name: wordpress/hits-pages-by-role
1.0.1.description:
Pages By Role gives designers the ability to add pages to a widget while specifying what WordPress roles are required to view the link.

From a drop down you can select the page, user role and optional override text for each link you want to have displayed.

Future Functionality

  • Nicer looking interface
  • Editing existing links
